description: This file contains CSS styles for a React application's theme management, including light and dark mode definitions, styles for the main app, and other UI components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling that includes alignment, colors, and background properties.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header style including background color, layout, and responsive properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links used in the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styling for theme toggling, including positioning and hover effects.
